entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableInterlocked.VolatileIsDefault #109572
  • [WASI] Options for implementing wasi-tls proposal #109569
  • [8.0] Assert contains failure, not found "Stopping after AOT" in Wasm.Build.Tests.NativeBuildTests.MonoAOTCross_WorksWithNoTrimming #109565
  • Consider publishing new version of System.Data.Common without transitive vulnerability #109551
  • AOT publish of project that uses lazy loading fails #109550
  • How to remove request-id and traceparent Header from HttpClient Request #109558
  • [API Proposal]: Apply [OverloadResolutionPriority] to Span-based MemoryExtensions overloads #109549
    10.0.0
  • Break base64 string after JsonObject to string method #109546
  • [mono][android][crash] inflated_method_equal [class.c : 1136] #109542
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 27 Regressions on 10/30/2024 5:40:05 PM #109555
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression in System.Collections.AddGivenSize #109557
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Vector Regressions on 10/31/2024 10:26:58 PM #109554
  • Hang during shutdown with Native AOT on IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources waiting for finalizers #109538
    9.0.x
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 Regressions on 11/1/2024 7:42:33 PM #109552
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: dotnet publish crashing when using PublishTrimmed option #109536
    10.0.0
  • android: Cannot detect when HTTPS server needs a client certificate with SocketsHttpHandler #109532
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_105474/Runtime_105474/Runtime_105474.cmd #109531

Closed

  • Consider releasing #107333 into dotnet 9 #109060
    9.0.x
  • CultureInfo on iOS doesn't have all the information that Windows or Android have. #109444
  • [Linux] Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E #13027
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: PemEncoding for UTF8 #99614
    10.0.0
  • typeof() prevents the assembly from unloading #109479
  • Assertion failed 'bPrev->HasFlag(BBF_RETLESS_CALL)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109515
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'this->Next()->KindIs(BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109514
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Creating a new thread from DllMain makes the program get stuck. #109543
  • Error in RuntimeInstance::GetThreadStore when calling a method from a static library. #108644
    Future
  • DefineConstants are getting overriden twice in Wasi.Build.Tests.csproj #108935
    10.0.0
  • Dispose error in System.Drawing.Brush #109533
  • Assembly::Load crashes C++/CLI app in try block with 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 #109242
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use type-level annotations for trimming/AOT analysis #109571
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP] Last Level Cache fix - .NET 8. #109567
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #109566
    needs-area-label
  • Change iOS PEM searcher to use PemEncoding.TryFindUtf8 #109564
    area-System.Security
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #109563
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Handle non-default active version and explicit IL code version cases for `CodeVersions.GetActiveNativeCodeVersion` #109560
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ILASM] Add wrappers for platform-specific SHA-256 implementations #109559
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109556
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • JIT: Fix codegen for misaligned double `STORE_LCL_FLD` on arm32 #109547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Block exporting DllMain #109545
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add GFNI Intrinsics #109537
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Repeat 3-opt layout for each region until convergence #109534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109530
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml #109528
    area-System.Xml

Merged

  • Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109458
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Add 1.1 runtime packages to PackageOverrides.txt #109553
    area-Setup
  • Remove unused `TypeHandle::GetDefiningModuleForOpenType` #109527
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.12 #109562
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove thread contention from Activity Start/Stop #109359
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.1
  • Add support for UTF-8 in PemEncoding #109438
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Reapply "Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type" #109525
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Unify DefineConstants #109541
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Eliminate redundant SafePasswordHandle values #109391
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Fix typo in PackageDownloadAndReference.targets #109197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest image #109454
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Don't convert unreachable `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` blocks to `BBJ_THROW` during morph #109519
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area owners #109509
    area-Meta
  • Do not override `DefineConstants` in WBT #109539
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • JIT: Add missing `lvTracked` check in `optLocalHasNonLoopUses` #109505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109524
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast in more places #109258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2575840 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0-staging] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109364
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109510
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109511
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.12
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Dedup remaining MemoryExtensions Span overloads #109501
    area-System.Memory
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Defer compilation in bblocks with unitialized stack #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
